attributes.action: calling for a public debate between farage & Cameron on the referendum
attributes.background:
Please help me get this petition signed and shared

As I think it's about time we had both leaders of the two parties that offered to bring this referendum to the table. I think it's only fitting that farage and Cameron have a debate on the same platform on this biggest decision we will ever make!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
